title: The Story of Two Brothers, a Hero and a Carpenter - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Dragons   Male Protagonist   Oneshot   Siblings   Stubborn Protagonist
author: Bookstore Zombie   Shoten Zombie   書店ゾンビ
description:
Two brothers stood before the ruins of their village, destroyed by a dragon.

The younger brother looked towards the sky, determined to slay the dragon that had destroyed their village.

The older brother looked towards the ground, determined to prevent this destruction from ever happening again.>
